arguments.info: Define the  path of the zip file of the application.
Version of the application
Buildpack to build the app. 3 options: a) Blank means autodetection; b) A Git Url pointing to a buildpack; c) Name of an installed buildpack.
The initial command for the app
The maximum amount of disk available to an instance of an app. In megabytes.
Key/value pairs of all the environment variables to run in your app. Does not include any system or service variables.
The number of instances
The amount of memory each instance should have. In megabytes.
The name for the app
Define the route guids which should be bound to the application.
Define the service instance guids that should be bound to this application.
Define space guid to which app belongs
Define timeout to wait for the app instances to start/update/restage etc. For example, if memory is updated then instances are automatically destroyed and new one spun up by the Cloud controller.

Define the route guids which should be bound to the application.
Define the service instance guids that should be bound to this application.
Define space guid to which app belongs
Define timeout to wait for the app instances to start/update/restage etc. For example, if memory is updated then instances are automatically destroyed and new one spun up by the Cloud controller.

arguments.info: Description of a load balancer.
The load balancer's name.
Protocols to be assigned to this load balancer.

subblock.info: Backend Protocol port number. Should be in range (1, 65535)
Backend protocol, one of 'TCP', 'HTTP'.
Frontend Protocol port number. Should be in range (1, 65535)
Frontend protocol, one of 'TCP', 'HTTP', 'HTTPS'.
Load balancing algorithm: 'round_robin', 'weighted_round_robin', 'least_connection'
No. of connections the listener can accept. Should be between 1-64000
Session stickness. Valid values is SOURCE_IP
This references to SSL/TLS certificate for a protocol

The weight of a load balancer member.
